author: DistroTube
description:
Virt-Manager (Virtual Machine Manager) is a popular graphical desktop application for managing virtual machines and containers on Linux, acting as a user-friendly frontend for the libvirt virtualization API.  It allows users to easily create, run, and manage VMs without complex command-line work. 

REFERENCED:
► https://virt-manager.org/
